snippet.title: 8-Bit Adventures 2 - Console Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
8-Bit Adventures 2 launches on Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, Xbox One & Xbox Series X/S on October 16th!

Pilot your Airship and explore a vast World Map in this exciting, emotional tribute to the Golden Age of JRPGs. Strengthen your party’s bonds with character-driven side-quests, and face off with challenging Super Bosses in dynamic Turn-Based battles!

While it may be a sequel, anyone can jump into this all-new JRPG experience!

#jrpg #rpg #pixelart #indiegame 

Official Website: https://www.8bitadventures2.com/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CriticalGamesAU 
Discord: https://discord.gg/aKf2tr4

Designed and Developed by: Josh Hallaran 
Pixel Art & Visual Design by: Jerram Fahey (NoeL) 
Soundtrack Composed by: Sebastian Cruz (Carfonu) 
Battle & UI Programming by: M. Sufyan Noor (DrDhoom)
Promotional Artwork by: Ryan Jampole
Port by: Ratalaika Games
